summary: A cozy little place near some scenic mountain falls just outside of Dragon Bridge.  Oh, and there\'s a Goonies-style cavern with a pirate ship.
descriptionHtml:
[b] Here\'s a great new mod anyone using a custom house should check out: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11370]Spouses Can Live Anywhere[/url][/b]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/H5tdMl.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jqBROl.jpg[/IMG]


[color=#E1860D][b][i]Captain William Drakehelm was a mysterious figure who showed up around Dragon Bridge seemingly out of nowhere in the early spring of 4E 192.  He purchased a beautiful plot of land along the river just below the falls, and the townsfolk were abuzz at the prospect of being employed in the construction of the home.

The Captain ruffled some feathers, to say the least, when he brought in his own large crew of rough characters to handle the job.  Adding insult to injury, the workers camped up on the property and never spent the first piece of gold in town. Rumors flew as construction dragged on and on...a year passed, and then two.  What in the world could have been taking so long?!

And then...as suddenly as the workers\' tent city had appeared, it was gone.  A beautiful house now stood up on the slopes, although no one could figure why the idiot had faced it away from town.  And where was the Captain, anyway?  It was as if the earth had swallowed him up without a trace.[/i][/b][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Qw3N3.png[/IMG]

I HIGHLY recommend picking up the following addons to get the nicest experience out of Drakehelm possible. If my screenshots look different than your screen, it\'s because of one of the following:

Elements from the wonderful \"Sexy\" series of texture packs are scattered throughout. Virtually all architectural elements of the house (inside and out) will be affected by \"Sexy Villages and Towns.\"  The others show up in a very limited capacity, but are all worth having as they make the cities look beautiful.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7583]Sexy Villages and Towns[/url] by horrorview
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7059]Sexy Whiterun[/url] by horrorview
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7484]Sexy Winterhold[/url] by horrorview
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7178]Sexy Windhelm[/url] by horrorview
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7241]Sexy Riften[/url] by horrorview

This is one of my favorite simple little mods, and I had it enabled while developing and testing the Grotto. I spent quite a bit of time getting the underwater areas just right, so if you want to experience it as intended make sure to get ClearWater
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10078]ClearWater[/url] by LittleRaptor

This is a silly little texture replacer I made for mannequins because I hate the vanilla look. Skipping this one will make very little difference, but here it is:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6644]Dark Leather Mannequins[/url]
author: mgbeach - with some great suggestions and critique from MsChif

files.name: Drakehelm Manor v1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Corrected terrain issue at rear of house
Added lampposts to the front walkway
Added chopping block to left of front door

files.name: Drakehelm Manor v1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Modified some navmeshes in rooms with mannequins to hopefully limit their wanderings
Overall lighting level increase
Small cosmetic changes (new plants, rug, etc)

files.name: Drakehelm Manor v1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Saber Kitty now chills out in the entrance area and provides companionship
Bookshelf added to bedroom (2 shelves of 18 books like the others)
Minor decoration changes
Second chest added in crafting room

files.name: Drakehelm Manor v1_4 - The Grotto
files.changelogHtml:
The builder of the manor, Captain Drakehelm, evidently had a little secret.
Welcome to the Grotto
Fireplace added in the main hall with crafting cookpot, which had been requested a few times
Continuing navmesh changes in an attempt to get the mannequins settled down.
Apothecary Satchel and Enchanting Strongbox added on their respective tables

files.name: Drakehelm Manor and Grotto 1_5
files.changelogHtml:
Additional Navmesh Tweaks
Numerous changes in Grotto, both above and below water
crafting equipment added to grotto.. on boat deck and grassy area
grotto atmosphere adjusted
Bubba the tame slaughterfish now makes a patrol in the grotto
Sabre Kitty should move between a few resting places in the manor

files.name: Drakehelm Manor and Grotto 1_6
files.changelogHtml:
Mod has been \"cleaned\" and people should see many fewer, if any, conflicts now
lighting and chests added to ship deck crafting area
you may want to do some exploring in the waters of the grotto for a hidden prize
